scripts.prebuild: rimraf ./build & mkdir build & rimraf ./public & mkdir public
scripts.build: npm run build:backend & npm run build:frontend
scripts.postbuild: ncp ./backend/dist build/ & mkdir build\frontend & ncp ./frontend/build/index.html ./build/frontend/index.html & ncp ./backend/public ./public & ncp ./frontend/build/static ./public/static & ncp ./frontend/build/libs ./public/libs & ncp ./frontend/build/robots.txt ./public/robots.txt & ncp ./frontend/build/favicon.svg ./public/favicon.svg & ncp ./frontend/build/manifest.json ./public/manifest.json & ncp ./frontend/build/asset-manifest.json ./public/asset-manifest.json
